statements: SELECT * FROM sensors_usage_history LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, measurement_value FROM sensors_usage_history WHERE measurement_value > 10;
SELECT * FROM sensors_usage_history WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensors_usage_history ORDER BY usage_date DESC, usage_time DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT AVG(measurement_value) AS average_value FROM sensors_usage_history;
SELECT sensor_id, measurement_value FROM sensors_usage_history WHERE sensor_id = 1
SELECT * FROM sensors_usage_history ORDER BY usage_date DESC, usage_time ASC
SELECT * FROM sensors_usage_history WHERE measurement_value > 50 AND usage_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT AVG(measurement_value) AS avg_measurement, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM sensors_usage_history WHERE experiment_id = 3
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_usage_count FROM sensors_usage_history GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY total_usage_count DESC
SELECT * FROM quantum_sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, usage_date FROM quantum_sensors ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_name, experiment_name, re.researcher_name FROM quantum_sensors qs JOIN experiments e ON qs.experiment_id = e.experiment_id JOIN researchers re ON e.researcher_id = re.researcher_id;
SELECT sensor_name, usage_date FROM quantum_sensors WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM quantum_sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, usage_date FROM quantum_sensors ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT s.sensor_name, e.experiment_name, r.researcher_name FROM quantum_sensors s JOIN experiments e ON s.experiment_id = e.experiment_id JOIN researchers r ON e.researcher_id = r.researcher_id;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, experiment_id FROM quantum_sensors WHERE usage_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT sensor_name, experiment_id FROM quantum_sensors;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT sensor_name, usage_date, usage_duration FROM quantum_sensors JOIN sensor_usage ON quantum_sensors.sensor_id = sensor_usage.sensor_id;
SELECT experiment_name, start_date, end_date FROM experiments ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(sensor_id) AS total_sensors FROM quantum_sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, usage_history FROM quantum_sensors
SELECT experiment_name, start_date, end_date FROM experiments
SELECT sensor_id, experiment_id, usage_date, usage_duration FROM sensor_usage
SELECT sensor_name, experiment_name, start_date FROM quantum_sensors JOIN experiments ON quantum_sensors.experiment_id = experiments.experiment_id
SELECT * FROM quantum_sensors WHERE sensor_id = 3
SELECT * FROM experiment;
SELECT experiment_date, experiment_name FROM experiment ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensor WHERE sensor_precision > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE data_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT experiment_name, sensor_name, data_value FROM experiment JOIN sensor_data ON experiment.experiment_id = sensor_data.experiment_id JOIN sensor ON sensor_data.sensor_id = sensor.sensor_id ORDER BY experiment_name ASC, data_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiment;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiment ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, sensor_name, sensor_type FROM experiment JOIN sensor_usage ON experiment.experiment_id = sensor_usage.experiment_id JOIN sensor ON sensor_usage.sensor_id = sensor.sensor_id;
SELECT experiment_name, AVG(data_value) AS average_value FROM experiment JOIN sensor_data ON experiment.experiment_id = sensor_data.experiment_id GROUP BY experiment_name;
SELECT sensor_name, COUNT(sensor_id) AS total_usage FROM sensor_usage JOIN sensor ON sensor_usage.sensor_id = sensor.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_name ORDER BY total_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiment;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiment WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensor ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT staff_name, staff_role FROM lab_staff WHERE staff_role = 'Researcher';
SELECT result_description, result_date FROM experiment_results ORDER BY result_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM experiment_results WHERE experiment_id = 1 ORDER BY result_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiment WHERE experiment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensor WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT staff_name, staff_role FROM lab_staff WHERE staff_role IN ('Researcher', 'Technician');
SELECT * FROM sensor INNER JOIN sensor_usage ON sensor.sensor_id = sensor_usage.sensor_id
